page.title: 05WORK SITUATION-CATTRICK
page.content: This area has a high rate of employment with only a small percentage of people out of work. The majority of those out of work are young people looking for jobs that offer a trade. Many are on government training schemes which offer one years employment but no job prospects at the end of the term. Those in employment are in a variety of jobs and professions. Consultants, surgeons, doctor, nurse, midwife, pilot, navigator, dentists, bank manager, sales representative, social worker, teacher, insurance collector, heavy goods vehicle driver, coalman, farmers ,store manager, shop assistants, joiner, plumber, council and waterboard workers, engineer, security guard, butcher, whitecollar worker, bank clerk, hairdressser and domestic workers.
